title: Vegan Coconut Strawberry Mousse
directions: Combine all ingredients (minus 4 strawberries) in a blender and blend for 2 minutes.
Transfer to a medium-sized sauce pan gently heat, making sure to constantly stir. (It is important or else it may burn!)
After 5 minutes or so, the paste will thicken. Gently spoon the paste into serving containers and chill for at least one hour.
*Agar sets quickly so move as fast as you can.
Serve with sliced strawberries, or your favorite fresh berries.
